Docs.param: The arguments from the original notification. This is either the launch argument if the user clicked the body of your toast, or the arguments from a button on your toast.
Text and selection values that the user entered in your toast.
Docs.summary: This method will be called when the user clicks on a foreground or background activation on a toast. Parent app must implement this method.
